Name: Laser Burst
About the game: Laser Burst is a logical puzzle game that requires players to rotate and position double sided mirrors that direct lasers through a maze to pop balloons. Features: 50 unique levels Level editor Ability to make and share millions of level combinations via the Steam Workshop Level completion ratings 6 puzzle pieces
